title: 10 days since I sent my support ticket.
body: The issue still has not been fixed. The person responding even managed to get the wrong account info. Is this real? Can someone over at Riot please handle my ticket already? It's all I am really asking for D:

replies.body:
I took a look at your ticket and it seems due to the information provided, it was unclear which account you were trying to recover. This can happen if you have multiple accounts with a lot of shared information. Since you already have an account specialist working with you, I recommend remaining patient while they continue to investigate and get back to you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Is this going to take another week?
